revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [recto] on account of po- 508; on account of 328 ar. po- 23; on account of 16 ar. po- 1; and on account of 30 ar. po- 2.; [l. 5] . . . 121; . . .; po- 16; po- 23; . . . io. [verso] -roubos Tebeseion the short; Anouphis son of Eulogios; Makarios Kopios the short; Timaios son of Neilos; [l. 5] Ioulios son of Alypios; . . . son of Leontios; . . .; -n son of Syriakos; . . . son of Agathos; [l. 10] Isak; -is son of Isak; . . . son of -paios; . . .; Konstantios son of Or-; [l. 15] Gaios Zoilos; Panos Eirenios; Herakles the trafficker; Papontos Neilos; heirs of Pamouthios; [l. 20] Apios son of Keparos; Sarapammon son of K-; Ploution son of Belanos.

listBibl.bibl: P.Princ. III 135 CPJ III 502 BL IX, 221; P. J. Sijpesteijn, "Corrections on Some Princeton Papyri," ZPE 68 (1987): 143-148.
